label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Fixed a bug where processing of deferred streams with the value of http.max_requests_per_io_cycle more than 1 could cause a crash.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Fixed a bug in the Datadog tracer where Datadog’s “operation name” field would contain what should be in the “resource name” field.
